summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 30, Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue and 9th Avenue, extending from Pike Street to Pine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9441 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
